name: King's Crown
description:
Agon lives in a peaceful town, seperated from the rest of the world.

One day, however, he must explore the ancient temple underneath the town, where he fights the evil creatures, that nearly destroyed humanity.

A small and classic rpg, with a few special extras like:

  • dynamic soundtrack, composed by myself
  • battles with quicktime events 
  • a big temple to discover

Have fun!
